rules_text:
Menace
[i]Chivalry [/i]– Whenever Xander, Prince of Nohr becomes blocked, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Xander attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, target opponent discards a card, sacrifices a nonland permanent and loses 3 life.
Partner with Ryoma, Prince of Hoshido [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Ryoma into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
